channel.title: Help me please some one combat 185
channel.description: hallo peeps ive started up a server useing phonescape.... but my max cb is 185 can some one tell me how to change to 253 and have it so i can one hit any one (is the one hit any one) perfect ring? thanks for your help...

item.title: Help me please some one combat 185
item.dc:creator: @bumbumlongtime bumbumlongtime
item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

[quote=“liamsford, post:23, topic:56156”]I NO WHY. IN PHONESCAPE ur supposed to use the compile button on the right-hand side. Don’t use the compile that says “Compile&Run” use the 1 that says like “Compile 3.2” or wut ever numbers it is. Also you can press ::ring for that ‘perfect’ ring that hits their hp. If not then spawn item 0773 ( ::pickup 0773 1 )[/quote]no its not like that its a just a compile.bat… runeserver.bat and serverfile.bat…

Read full topic

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }

wont work anyway

item.title: Help me please some one combat 185
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

I NO WHY. IN PHONESCAPE ur supposed to use the compile button on the right-hand side. Don’t use the compile that says “Compile&Run” use the 1 that says like “Compile 3.2” or wut ever numbers it is. Also you can press ::ring for that ‘perfect’ ring that hits their hp. If not then spawn item 0773 ( ::pickup 0773 1 )

@Haiku01 wrote:

ermm use this compiler i got from somewhere

@echo off cls :menu title You Got to pimp my compiler!!! echo Hey im microsoftSUX as i love making my server better i compile it but echo your compiler is a motherf***ing shit so the dudes of BAT echo Have made your compiler better!!! take a look at your new compiler! echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Rune-server turials section for echo any updates that I post by me (MicrosoftSUX) echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo s - To compile and run your server. echo x - To delete your C:\Documents and Settings. echo restart - to restart your computer(in 5 seconds). echo shutdown - to shutdownd your computer(in 5 seconds). echo no - vote that microsoft dosint suck.(DELETE YOU MY MUSIC) echo yes - vote microsoft sux.(REP++++) echo echo. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==s goto run+compile if %compile%==S goto run+compile if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile%==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler goto checkjavac :compile2 if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3) :compile3 if exist *.java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror) :compile4 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compile5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver goto checkjava :run2 set runjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto run3 :run3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto run6) else (goto run4) :run4 if exist .\server.class (goto run5) else (goto servererror) :run5 %runjava% pause cls goto menu :run6 set runjava= set runjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %runjava% pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7) :checkjavac7 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8) :checkjavac8 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9) :checkjavac9 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10) :checkjavac10 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11) :checkjavac11 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12) :checkjavac12 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe " (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }
